entities.name: Accounts
entities.description: Transaction, credit, debit or other types of accounts held by our customers

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The primary key of the account

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Specifies the type of bank account

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The customer-managed label for the account

attributes.name: created
attributes.description: The timestamp at which the account was created

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The primary key of the interaction

attributes.name: source_account_id
attributes.description: The account the funds were transferred from

attributes.name: dest_account_id
attributes.description: The destination account receiving the funds

attributes.name: amount
attributes.description: The total amount of the transaction

attributes.name: recorded
attributes.description: The time at which this interaction was recorded
